name: JurassicDragon and the Binary Relic
description:
JurassicDragon and the Binary Relic is a first person puzzle game set in the bowels of a museum in the near future.

You are after a job and the museum is hiring. Strangely though you are asked to go to the rear entrance. Once inside you are confused and disorientated amongst the myriad of corridors and rooms inhabited by strange creatures who do not always have your best interests at heart. You are desperate to escape but can you really trust the words of a cunning dragon?

You must use your wits to battle through the passageways with their various dangers including toxic materials raining down and use secret doors and rooms to help guide you through .

Once you crack the puzzle you can once again take a deep breath of fresh air as you escape the clutches of the museum and its inhabitants.
